name: Manic Destruction (beta)
description:
A recreation of Manic Miner using physics.  This game is still in development. Currently 5 levels from the original have been recreated, but with a physics twist.

CONTROLS:

  • Left: A or O or Left arrow
  • Right: D or P or Right arrow
  • Jump: W, Space or Up arrow
  • Shoot: Left mouse button
  • Restart Level: R
  • Toggle full-screen: F11
  • Quit: Esc
